backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing authorization plus user profiles, posts, comments, reactions, and reports with CRUD-style query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing UI components, pages, hooks, and styling used in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, and global UI wrapper for feed, create, post detail, and guidelines pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Signâ€‘in/out button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated first-time users to set a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Hero banner with app branding, description, and optional hero image for the feed page.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Provides a form to create comments or replies, handling submission state and success callbacks.
Renders a comment with author info, reactions like reporting, and displays or composes replies.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedControl: Adds UI controls for filtering posts by type and searching, with an option to clear active filters.
Defines the main layout with header navigation, mobile menu, profile setup dialog, and content outlet.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Shows a post preview with tags, author, timestamp, and navigation to the detailed post view.
Manages interactive tag entry with validation, adding, removing, and limiting to five tags.
frontend/src/components/reactions/Reacti: Displays and toggles support/helpful reactions for a post with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/report/ReportDia: Provides a dialog for reporting posts or comments, handling authentication and submission state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Provides hooks to fetch comments and replies and to create new comments with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePost.ts: Mutation hook for creating posts and invalidating the posts list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile with proper loading and invalidation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Fetches the current user's role from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostDetail.ts: Fetches a single post by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Retrieves posts based on filters or search keywords via backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches community guidelines text from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useReactions.ts: Handles fetching reaction counts and toggling user reactions with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useReportContent.ts: Mutation hook for reporting posts or comments to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches a specific user's profile by principal ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityGuidelinesPa: Renders the community guidelines page with static rules and fetched backend guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: React page that lets authenticated users create a question or story with title, body, and tags, redirecting to the new post after submission and prompting unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main community feed displaying posts with filtering and search, plus controls to navigate to post creation and handle loading or error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows full post details, author info, reactions, reporting, and threaded comments, handling loading, error, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing and retrieving them from sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, layout, and animations for the app's visual design.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, versions, and asset expectations for the community support app.
